attributes.action: Formally acknowledge the end of Operation Banner
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hundreds of thousands of HM Forces were deployed to Northern Ireland during what has become known as "The Troubles".

Over 1400 members of HM Forces died whilst posted to Northern Ireland, this does not include the members of the RUC (GC) PSNI or Northern Ireland Prison service that were killed.

As veterans of the Northern Ireland conflict, we would like the British Government to formally acknowledge the hard work and sacrifice of all those involved in Operation Banner. We have been refused permission to give the Northern Ireland Veterans Association web site address on this petition.
